name: Inventory Management for Wire Manufacturing
description: This is a major project which combines the wire manufacturing pipeline operations. Including; raw material ordering, raw material management, formulation testing and manufacturing order management.

name: Earthquake Donation Scam Warning
description: A website to inform donators about ongoing scams taking advantage of earthquake in Turkey, 2023. Main purpose of this project is to prevent scammers from taking donations from people who are in need.

name: Energyplus Improvement and Visualization Tool
description: Tool made for evaluating and comparing the energy efficiency of architectural design alternatives. It streamlined the process, reduced comparison time by 81.3% and editing idf time by 57.6%.

name: Image4io Node SDK
description: Node.js SDK for the content optimization service Image4io.

name: Manage Wifi
description: Added Windows support to the open source project, manage wifi.

name: Model2Image Generator
description: A tool designed to generate object detection model training data from 3D models fetched from various marketplaces.

name: Usually Fun Games
description: An attempt of creating a mini Hyper-Casual game studio. 4/6 games currently available on Google Play Store.

name: Digitalized Enigma Machine Reconstruction
description: A project to replicate the original Enigma Machine by using STM32. Main objective in this project is to create a machine that is easy to replicate and can be used to teach the basic concepts of cryptology.

name: Ampleforth MarketCap Trading Bot
description: It is a marketcap trading bot that takes advantage of economy-based ecosystem of Ampleforth. It is just developed for fun and proof of concept.

name: The New Deal - Negotiation Agent
description: Negotiation agent that is tuned to perform under uncertainty. It is uses the GENIUS Framework.
